tool_description: Calculates wildfire risk based on location, vegetation, topography, and weather patterns.

vegetation_type.description: Surrounding vegetation (grassland, brush, forest, desert, urban)

defensible_space_feet.description: Cleared defensible space around structure in feet

slope_percentage.description: Ground slope percentage where building is located

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Unknown vegetation type: Use grassland, brush, forest, desert, or urban.
Defensible space error: Must be between 0 and 500 feet.
Slope error: Percentage must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide property coordinates (latitude, longitude), vegetation_type, and defensible_space_feet. Include slope_percentage for properties on hills or mountains.

wildfire_risk_level.description: Overall wildfire risk level (low, moderate, high, extreme)
